question.para: What are the basic packages to run ADA in Windows?

answer.para: ADA needs Cygwin to execute some of the tools it uses. Cygwin is a unix like environment that installs as a native windows application.
Installing cygwin is done using an installer which allows to select and/or remove multiple packages. The bare minimum packages to use with ADA are:

listitem.para: docbook-xsl: XSL stylesheets for the DocBook XML DTD
git: Fast version control system used to download the latest ADA version.
